about_the_game:
There are some MMD resources provided here for non-commercial use.
After downloading this DLC, you'll find a folder named "CE2MMD" in your game folder.
You can use them to create your own MMD music video. Have fun!

  • Models
    Cinderella Original 01, Cinderella Original 02, Snow White, Vanessa, Queen Eireen, Pinocchio, The Prince, and Robert
  • Stages
    Magic Ring, Night SkyDome
  • Motions
    Character Motion of the ThemeSong "Snow White", Camera Motion of the Theme Song "Snow White"
detailed_description:
There are some MMD resources provided here for non-commercial use.
After downloading this DLC, you'll find a folder named "CE2MMD" in your game folder.
You can use them to create your own MMD music video. Have fun!

  • Models
    Cinderella Original 01, Cinderella Original 02, Snow White, Vanessa, Queen Eireen, Pinocchio, The Prince, and Robert
  • Stages
    Magic Ring, Night SkyDome
  • Motions
    Character Motion of the ThemeSong "Snow White", Camera Motion of the Theme Song "Snow White"

name: Cinderella Escape 2 Revenge - MMD Resources

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 class processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Minimum system requirements for running MMD.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentinum Dual Core or abobe
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8XXX Series
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Optimum system requirements for running MMD.

short_description: Cinderella Escape 2 Revenge - MMD Models, Stages, and Motions.
